name: Ortus: The RPG of your dreams!
blurb: Ortus is a massive story-focused RPG, based in a world where every choice you make results in your own unique path in the game!

rewards.reward: High Resolution Image Pack, featuring many of the original artworks from the game!
All of the above, and entry to (earliest) closed Beta Testing, and a 'special thanks' in the credits!
All of the above, and a digital copy of the games' soundtrack (by Charles Evans), featuring the award winning Lisa Gerrard (vocals from movies like Gladiator, Ali, Man on fire and more)
(Hands-On!) The above, as well as a 30+ page (soft cover) book featuring much of the games beautiful art, sent to you signed by me, Jazza, artistic director of Ortus!

All of the above, and you get to help design your own NPC, making you a permanent part of a game that will be played by millions! Name a character after yourself, a friend, or one of your own roleplay characters! (Keeping in mind we will work with you to make sure it fits with our game setting/theme properly)
All of the above, and your NPC is upgraded to be able to give a quest! Thousands of people will meet your character and be asked to accomplish a task for a reward.
All of the above, and the NPC quest is given depth. The quest becomes a 'chain quest', involving several more NPC's you will assist in creating, a few 'back and forth' tasks with rewards and loot!

(check THIS out) All of the above, and you work with me directly to design you own breed of monster in the game!! (no artistic talent required, only imagination, I'll work from your descriptions or ideas to make something awesome!). Yes, millions of players will encounter that creature you've always imagined in your head, and fight it to the death! BONUS REWARD (newly added!): Our environment artist will hand craft a custom house/residence for your NPC character to live in! (that, or something else like a dungeon or mansion etc.)

All of the above, and you will be sent a one-of-a-kind hand crafted and signed book (by the 4 creators), featuring tons of information on the setting and conceptualization on the game, as well as the new credit title "Associate Producer".

All of the above, and 3xPoster pack, one of which will feature a painted image of your character in a pose/setting of your choice, as well as a personal video from the story directors about the process of creating and rigging your character.

All of the above, and (this is a BIGGIE) you will work directly with our writer, to create a 'companion NPC'. There are only 10 of these so far in the game. They are carefully crafted NPC's that players can convince to join them on their journey, with their own fighting style, abilities, relationship traits and quests. They also get their own 'ending path' clip when someone finishes the game.

All of the above, (companion NPC exempt, but you still get the custom NPC with a massive quest and location) PLUS you get to work directly with the game directors to create your own 'guild' in the game, so in one of the capital cities there will stand your own unique (LARGE) building with your own unique crest, with a lot of member NPCs and quests (all custom!), not to mention this guild will become a permanent part of the game's culture and history!

-----(COMMERCIAL INTEREST ONLY!)-----

A uniquely produced version of the game sitelocked to your website, delivered after the Armor-Games exclusive release period (one month). It will incorporate and support your websites API's and the game will include your websites intro animation and logo on main menu. 
 ----- 
All public versions of the game will also feature your company title early in the credits as 'Supported by' including your logo and link.
